briefTitle: Active-control Randomized Trial Comparing 4-factor Prothrombin Complex Concentrate With Frozen Plasma in Cardiac Surgery
officialTitle: Prospective, Multicenter, Active-control Randomized Trial Comparing 4-factor Prothrombin Complex Concentrate With Frozen Plasma in Bleeding Adult Cardiac Surgical Patients
summary: This is a multicenter, active-control randomized, prospective, Phase 3 study in adult cardiac surgery patients. 420 patients were randomized at 12 hospitals.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients Requiring Additional Hemostatic Intervention
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 60 minutes to 24 hours after first dose of IMP
